etomica.modules.crystalviewer

Class ClipPlaneEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.modules.crystalviewer.ClipPlaneEditor

  • public class ClipPlaneEditor
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that produces a panel with controls that presence, orientation and position of a plane that clips atoms from the display. Permits different surfaces of the lattice to be displayed. Also controls highlighting of atoms that are in the plane.
